name: Cash N' Swagg
tag_list: social-network, urban-community, upload-music, entertainment, share, download-music
overview:
Social media at its best. An interactive way to stay informed. Focused on the entertainment industry, cashnswagg.com hosts mass media news and updates and also offers a wide catalog of music downloads.

Founded in April, 2012 by Manahan Media Worldwide, cashnswagg.com has generated a small buzz in the tri-state area and is growing fast.

Musicians can upload and share their music with the world. The site also offers free promotion to approved artists via soundcloud widgets ran through an ad server.

Cashnswagg.com plans to encourage and promote young adults pursuing careers in the entertainment industry. Develop and maintain innovative ways to create and share content with the world.
